overview: John-Ashley Paul brings years of high technology and marketing experience and expertise to CUBUS Solutions, including over six years leading credit union core data processing vendor. He was instrumental in developing and rolling out Internet strategy and was an early innovator in home banking as a driving force behind online banking solutions. John-Ashley led marketing efforts at several technology companies including Siemens, Enterworks, Asterion, and Interpro. John’s extensive marketing experience and track record of innovation are central to CUBUS Solutions’ success in providing leading edge software applications to our clients.
